title: The FSM Helm chart values schema

enable.title: Autoscale enable
enable.description: Indicates whether autoscale should be enabled or not.

minReplicas.title: Autoscale minimum replicas
minReplicas.description: Indicates the minimum replicas for autoscale.

maxReplicas.title: Autoscale maximum replicase
maxReplicas.description: Indicates the maximum replicas for autoscale.

targetAverageUtilization.title: Autoscale cpu targetAverageUtilization
targetAverageUtilization.description: Indicates average target cpu utilization (percentage) for autoscale.

targetAverageUtilization.title: Autoscale memory targetAverageUtilization
targetAverageUtilization.description: Indicates average target memory utilization (percentage) for autoscale.

fsm.title: The fsm schema
fsm.description: The top level required key in the values file.

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the fsm-controller pod

enablePodDisruptionBudget.title: The enablePodDisruptionBudget schema
enablePodDisruptionBudget.description: Indicates whether Pod Disruption Budget should be enabled or not.

kernelTracing.title: kernel tracing enable
kernelTracing.description: Indicates whether kernel tracing should be enabled or not.

cniMode.title: cni plugin enable
cniMode.description: Indicates whether cni plugin should be enabled or not.

image.title: The image schema
image.description: The details of the images to run.

registry.title: The registry schema
registry.description: The registry of the images to run.

name.title: Default image names
name.description: Default image names for control plane.

digest.title: Default image digests
digest.description: Default image digests for control plane.

sidecarClass.title: The sidecarClass schema
sidecarClass.description: The class of the FSM Sidecar.

sidecarImage.title: The sidecarImage schema
sidecarImage.description: The proxy side car image to run.

sidecarDrivers.title: The sidecarDriver schema
sidecarDrivers.description: The class of the FSM Sidecar Driver.

curlImage.title: The curlImage schema
curlImage.description: The curl image for control plane init containers.

serviceLBImage.title: The serviceLBImage schema
serviceLBImage.description: The serviceLB image for control plane.

image.title: Pipy repo server's image schema
image.description: Image used for pipy repo server

standalone.title: Install Mode of RepoServer
standalone.description: if false , RepoServer is installed within fsmController pod.

ipaddr.title: The ipaddr schema for pipy repo server
ipaddr.description: Ip address of the pipy repo server

codebase.title: The codebase schema for pipy repo server
codebase.description: Codebase is the folder used by fsmController.

trustDomain.title: The certificate issuance Trust Domain
trustDomain.description: The trust domain to use as part of the common name when requesting new certificates.

kind.title: The certificate provider kind schema
kind.description: The certificate manager fsm-controller should use.

certKeyBitSize.title: The certKeyBitSize schema
certKeyBitSize.description: The key size for data plane certificates.

caBundleSecretName.title: The caBundleSecretName schema
caBundleSecretName.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

enableDebugServer.title: The enableDebugServer schema
enableDebugServer.description: Indicates whether the Debug Server should be enabled or not.

enablePermissiveTrafficPolicy.title: The enablePermissiveTrafficPolicy schema
enablePermissiveTrafficPolicy.description: Indicates whether permissive traffic policy should be enabled or not.

trafficInterceptionMode.title: The trafficInterceptionMode schema
trafficInterceptionMode.description: Traffic interception mode in the mesh.

enableEgress.title: The enableEgress schema
enableEgress.description: Indicates whether egress should be enabled or not.

enableReconciler.title: The enableReconciler schema
enableReconciler.description: Indicates whether FSM's reconciler should be enabled or not.

deployConsulConnector.title: The deployConsulConnector schema
deployConsulConnector.description: Indicates whether Consul Connector should be installed and configured as part of the fsm control plane.

deployEurekaConnector.title: The deployEurekaConnector schema
deployEurekaConnector.description: Indicates whether Eureka Connector should be installed and configured as part of the fsm control plane.

deployPrometheus.title: The deployPrometheus schema
deployPrometheus.description: Indicates whether Prometheus should be installed and configured as part of the fsm control plane.

deployGrafana.title: The deployGrafana schema
deployGrafana.description: Indicates whether Grafana should be installed and configured as part of the fsm control plane.

enableFluentbit.title: The enableFluentbit schema
enableFluentbit.description: Indicates whether Fluent Bit log forwarding should be enabled

fluentBit.title: The Fluent Bit schema
fluentBit.description: The default details of the Fluent Bit sidecar if enabled.

name.title: The name schema
name.description: The name of the Fluent Bit container

registry.title: The registry schema
registry.description: The registry of the image to run.

outputPlugin.title: The output plugin for Fluent Bit
outputPlugin.description: The log forwarding destination plugin for Fluent Bit

workspaceId.title: The Fluent Bit workspaceId schema
workspaceId.description: The workspace ID for Fluent Bit output plugin to Log Analytics

primaryKey.title: The Fluent Bit primaryKey schema
primaryKey.description: The primary key for Fluent Bit output plugin to Log Analytics

enableProxySupport.title: The enableProxySupport output schema
enableProxySupport.description: Indicates whether outbound proxy support should be configured for Fluent Bit

meshName.title: The meshName schema
meshName.description: The name associated with the control plane being installed.

maxDataPlaneConnections.title: The maxDataPlaneConnections schema
maxDataPlaneConnections.description: Sets the Max Data Plane Connections

configResyncInterval.title: The configResyncInterval schema
configResyncInterval.description: Sets the resync interval for regular proxy broadcast updates

localProxyMode.title: The localProxyMode schema
localProxyMode.description: Proxy mode for the Sidecar proxy sidecar. Acceptable values are ['Localhost', 'PodIP'].

localDNSProxy.title: The local DNS Proxy schema
localDNSProxy.description: Local DNS Proxy improves the performance of your computer by caching the responses coming from your DNS servers.

enable.title: The enable schema for local DNS Proxy
enable.description: Indicates whether local DNS Proxy is enabled or not

primaryUpstreamDNSServerIPAddr.title: Primary upstream DNS server for local DNS Proxy
primaryUpstreamDNSServerIPAddr.description: Primary upstream DNS server for local DNS Proxy

secondaryUpstreamDNSServerIPAddr.title: Secondary upstream DNS server for local DNS Proxy
secondaryUpstreamDNSServerIPAddr.description: Secondary upstream DNS server for local DNS Proxy

enforceSingleMesh.title: The enforceSingleMesh schema
enforceSingleMesh.description: Enforce only running a single control plane within a cluster.

deployJaeger.title: The deployJaeger schema
deployJaeger.description: Indicates whether Jaeger should be installed and configured as part of the control plane.

tracing.title: The tracing schema
tracing.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

enable.title: The enable schema for tracing
enable.description: Indicates whether tracing is enabled or not

remoteLogging.title: The remote logging schema
remoteLogging.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

enable.title: The enable schema for tracing
enable.description: Indicates whether remote logging is enabled or not

level.title: The level schema for remote logging service
level.description: Level of the remote logging service

address.title: The address schema for remote logging service
address.description: Address of the remote logging service

port.title: The port schema for remote logging service
port.description: Port of the remote logging service

endpoint.title: The endpoint schema for remote logging service

authorization.title: The authorization for remote logging service

secretName.title: The secret name for remote logging service
secretName.description: The secret name for remote logging service

webhookConfigNamePrefix.title: Webhook Config Name Prefix
webhookConfigNamePrefix.description: Prefix for the webhook name, which uses the format <webhook-prefix>-<mesh-name>

fsmNamespace.title: The namespace of the FSM control plane components
fsmNamespace.description: Indicates the namespace in which the FSM control plane components will be installed

enablePrivilegedInitContainer.title: The enablePrivilegedInitContainer schema
enablePrivilegedInitContainer.description: Indicates whether the init container for pods in the mesh should be privileged

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the fsm-injector pod.

enablePodDisruptionBudget.title: The enablePodDisruptionBudget schema
enablePodDisruptionBudget.description: Indicates whether Pod Disruption Budget should be enabled or not.

webhookTimeoutSeconds.title: Webhook Timeout Seconds
webhookTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for the mutating webhook in seconds

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the fsm-consul-connector pod.

enablePodDisruptionBudget.title: The enablePodDisruptionBudget schema
enablePodDisruptionBudget.description: Indicates whether Pod Disruption Budget should be enabled or not.

httpAddr.title: The http address of Consul Service
The http address of Consul Service

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the FSM bootstrap pod.

podLabels.title: The podLabels schema
podLabels.description: Labels for the FSM bootstrap pod.

namespaced.title: Enabled namespaced Ingress Controller or not

enableEgressPolicy.title: Enable FSM's Egress policy
enableEgressPolicy.description: Enable FSM's Egress policy for fine grained control over egress (external) traffic

enableIngressBackendPolicy.title: Enable FSM to use the IngressBackend API
enableIngressBackendPolicy.description: Enable FSM to use the IngressBackend API for allowing ingress to mesh backends

enableAccessControlPolicy.title: Enable FSM to use the AccessControl API
enableAccessControlPolicy.description: Enable FSM to use the AccessControl API for allowing access control traffic to mesh backends

enableAccessCertPolicy.title: Enable FSM to issue certificates for external services
enableAccessCertPolicy.description: Enable FSM to issue certificates for external services

enableSidecarActiveHealthChecks.title: Enable Sidecar active health checks
enableSidecarActiveHealthChecks.description: EnableSidecarActiveHealthChecks defines if FSM will Sidecar active health checks between services allowed to communicate

enableSnapshotCacheMode.title: Enable SnapshotCache feature for Sidecar xDS server
enableSnapshotCacheMode.description: Enable SnapshotCache feature in FSM controller to cache snapshots for Sidecar xDS configurations.

enableMeshRootCertificate.title: Enable the MeshRootCertificate
enableMeshRootCertificate.description: Enable the MeshRootCertificate to configure the FSM certificate provider.

pspEnabled.title: The pspEnabled schema
pspEnabled.description: Indicates whether FSM should run with PodSecurityPolicies

controlPlaneTolerations.title: The controlPlaneTolerations schema
controlPlaneTolerations.description: Node tolerations applied to control plane pods to schedule onto nodes with matching taints

outboundIPRangeExclusionList.title: The outboundIPRangeExclusionList schema
outboundIPRangeExclusionList.description: Outbound IP range exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

outboundIPRangeInclusionList.title: The outboundIPRangeInclusionList schema
outboundIPRangeInclusionList.description: Outbound IP range inclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

outboundPortExclusionList.title: The outboundPortExclusionList schema
outboundPortExclusionList.description: Outbound port exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

inboundPortExclusionList.title: The inboundPortExclusionList schema
inboundPortExclusionList.description: Inbound port exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

networkInterfaceExclusionList.title: The networkInterfaceExclusionList schema
networkInterfaceExclusionList.description: Network interface exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

enableRemoteRendering.title: Grafana's enableRemoteRendering schema
enableRemoteRendering.description: Enable remote rendering of Grafana's dashboards

host.title: Hashicorp Vault's host schema
host.description: Hashicorp Vault host/service - where Vault is installed

port.title: Hashicorp Vault's port
port.description: Port to use to connect to vault

protocol.title: Hashicorp Vault's protocol schema
protocol.description: Protocol to use to connect to Vault

token.title: Hashicorp Vault's token schema
token.description: Token to use to connect to Vault

name.title: Vault token secret name schema
name.description: Name of the Kubernetes Secret to store the vault token

key.title: Vault token secret key schema
key.description: Name of the Kubernetes Secret key with the value of the vault token

imagePullSecrets.title: The imagePullSecrets schema
imagePullSecrets.description: ImagePullSecrets for the control plane pod

validateTrafficTarget.title: Validate Traffic Target
validateTrafficTarget.description: Enables validation of SMI Traffic Target
